review: I had visited the hospital and met the doctor for a digestion issue. Consultation experience was ok with the doctor. I am 60 percent satisfied with consultation and I am not much satisfied with the diagnosis. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation. There was some waiting time in the hospital, it was more than 30 minutes. Doctor was friendly, he was busy person.
Doctor is very practical and simple in explaining the issues and treatment. Waiting time was too long as hospital staff were not communicating well.
Our appointment was fixed at 6.30.postponed to 7.30.when reached we were told  no appointment ,queue

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: good investigation *** ***** ********** well experienced doctor. He has clearly explained about the problem and given well solution. now I am alright. thank you dr Bharath. God bless you
